HeroSection.title: Hope in Health:
HeroSection.subtitle: Medical Devices for Healthcare Turnkey Projects
HeroSection.text: We deliver customized solutions that meet your project’s budget, timeline, and technical needs, all focused on improving patient care.

ExtraHeader.description: we believe everyone deserves access to quality healthcare, and we’re here to make it happen.

SolutionsSection.title: OUR SOLUTIONS
SolutionsSection.MedicalImagingdescription: MEDI'INNOV ultrasound systems, magnetic resonance technology and x-ray devices provide a comprehensive portfolio of complete hard & software solutions tailored for global imaging needs.
SolutionsSection.OrSolutionsdescription: OR Solutions from SternMed, including anesthesia units, surgical tables and surgical lights, are designed to support clinicians worldwide to provide health care for their patients.
SolutionsSection.PatientCaredescription: MEDI'INNOV provides patient care devices like patient monitors, infusion and syringe pumps and medical ventilators, to support clinicians in giving exceptional patient care to their patients.

Home.desc: MEDIINOV specializes in the commercialization of medical devices and equipment for both the public and private sectors. As a publisher, distributor, and integrator, MEDIINNOV is the only group in Morocco to offer a fully integrated global solution that meets all the needs of an imaging center or service:

Slider.Sallederadiologiedescription: Discover our modern radiology equipment, offering precise results and optimal comfort for all patients.
Slider.Imageriefemmedescription: Specializing in women's care, our clinic offers personalized imaging exams for gynecological and obstetric follow-up.
Slider.Imageriedentairedescription: Our dental radiographs provide an accurate diagnosis, essential for quality dental care.
Slider.echographiedescription: Our ultrasound service uses the latest technology for safe, quick, and reliable examinations.
Slider.Gestionducabinetdescription: Our clinic management system ensures efficient organization for seamless medical follow-up.
Slider.Suivienterprétationdescription: Our medical team assists you with clear interpretation of results and personalized follow-up.

Footer.talkdesc: Have any questions for us? Chat with our team on Facebook or WhatsApp now.
Footer.title: At the same time editor, distributor and integrator, MEDI'INNOV is the only group in Morocco to offer a fully integrated global solution covering all the needs of an imaging center or service.

About.title: Support for imaging centers.
About.description: MEDIINOV is a company specializing in the marketing of medical devices and equipments, for the public and private sectors. At the same time editor, distributor and integrator, MEDIINNOV is the only group in Morocco to offer a fully integrated global solution covering all the needs of an imaging center or service:
